author: mvila09
title: Ahsoka,Jedi padawan and defender of the Republic!
review: This set is a must buy because say it takes a lot of time to save money to buy the AT-TE,Twilight,or even Ahsoka's starfighter.Just buy this set.The problems are that you can't remove some pieces(I would say head,legs,and headpiece)Pros:Ahsoka must be in any Clonewars minifig collection,Some parts are removable,You can rip of the chain to have it as a minifig.Cons:You can't make custom minifigs like Shaak Ti,I said it once I'll say it again the head is not removable.*****5 stars
